hydrogen:build.description: Builds a Hydrogen storefront for production

path.name: path
path.description: the path to your hydrogen storefront

port.name: port
port.description: Port to run the preview server on

disableRouteWarning.name: disableRouteWarning
disableRouteWarning.description: Disable warning about missing standard routes

path.name: path
path.description: the path to your hydrogen storefront

args.name: resource
args.description: The resource to check. Currently only 'routes' is supported.

hydrogen:dev.description: Runs Hydrogen storefront in a MiniOxygen worker in development

path.name: path
path.description: the path to your hydrogen storefront

port.name: port
port.description: Port to run the preview server on

hydrogen:init.description: Creates a new Hydrogen storefront project

language.name: language
language.description: Language to use for the project

path.name: path
path.description: The path to create the project in

token.name: token
token.description: A GitHub token used to access access private repository templates

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory if it already exists

hydrogen:preview.description: Runs an existing Hydrogen storefront build in a MiniOxygen worker

paths.name: paths
paths.description: the path to your hydrogen storefront

port.name: port
port.description: Port to run the preview server on

binPath.name: binPath
binPath.description: The path where the shortcut should be created. This is generally the path to a global NPM bin directory (`npm bin -g`).

path.name: path
path.description: the path to your hydrogen storefront

adapter.name: adapter
adapter.description: The Remix adapter for imports in the template (default: @shopify/remix-oxygen)

args.name: route
args.description: The route to generate a route for.
